amendatorysection.para: Any person violating the Agricultural Liming Materials Act shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor upon the first conviction thereof, and a Class IV misdemeanor for each subsequent conviction thereof.

Nothing in the act shall be construed to require the director or his or her duly authorized agent to report a violation in order to prosecute or to institute seizure proceedings as a result of minor violations of the act when he or she believes that the public interest will best be served by a suitable written warning to the violator.
